translation: Having become the fire Vaisvanara, I abide in the bodies of living beings and, associated with the Prana and the Apana, digest the fourfold food.
commentary: 15.14 I I? Vaishvanara (the fire) Vaisvanara? becoming having become? of living beings? Deham the body? dependent abiding? Pranapanasamayuktaá¸¥ associated with Prana and Apana? I digest (I) digest? Annam food? Chaturvidham fourfold.Commentary The immanence of the Lord as the gastric fire in all living beings is described in this verse.Vaisvanara The fire that abides in the stomach. This fire is
